text: Somalia, Awdal, Quljeed Quljeed is a town in the western Awdal region of Somaliland. It is notable for being the birth place of Dahir Riyale Kahin 3rd President of Somaliland. ==Overview== Quljeed is situated about 30 km to the northwest of Borama. Ciabarri, Dopo Lo Stato Storia e Antropologia Della ricomposizione Sociale Nella Somalia Settentrionale, (FrancoAngeli), p. 65. ==Demographics== The town is inhabited by the Reer Dudub branch of the Jibriil Yoonis, a subclan of the Gadabuursi Dir clan. ==See also== *Nimmo *Gondal ==Notes== ==References== *Abasa Category:Archaeological sites in Somalia Category:Former populated places in Somalia Category:Cities of the Adal Sultanate
title: Quljeed
